name: Zombie Basement (Sticky Tape Games)
description:
Welcome To Zombie Basement ______________________________________

You're locked in a Basement without an knowledge of where you are. 

But you have a weird sense of knowledge of items you saw on the news maybe the same items can help you escape from this hole.                                                                                                                         

But in the distans you hear a weird kind of mourning what can that be?  

______________________________________

HOW TO PLAY?

-Download the zip file.

-Unpack the zip file

-Open the unpacked file and double click on ZombieBasement.exe

-Goodluck trying to escape!

______________________________________
